name: Party Looper
description:
Made for B&W Game Jam 2022! Themes were "Loop" and a duochromatic scheme.

All art assets were created with Hot Pink #ff3bbb and Dark Blue #101c88.

Team:

Producer: Jonah Gertz

Game Designer: Georgio Klironomos

Game Designer & Programmer: Joey Stephens

Programmer: Alexander Kuang 

Narrative & Dialogue Designer: Cayla Macres

2D Artist: Merita Lundstrom

2D Artist: Vicente Hernandez

3D/UI Artist: Toto Lin

Sound Designer: Rachel Trieu

Special thanks to Playtesters, Friends, & Family
